org.jetel.graph.dictionary

Class DictionaryFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.dictionary.DictionaryFactory

  • public class DictionaryFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Clover engine dictionary object can be built and serialize by this factory class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Dictionary loadDictionary(java.io.InputStream is)
      Create new dictionary instance based on xml specification at given InputStream.
      static void saveDictionary(Dictionary dictionary, java.io.OutputStream os)
      Serializes the given dictionary in XML form into given OutputStream.
